name: Vienna Jatek
short_description: A rugalmas and agressziv alternative to 2.Nf3, often leading to f4 gyalog storms and sharp taktikai play.

name: Kiralynoi Gambit
short_description: A romantic-era attacking opening where White sacrifices a gyalog for rapid fejlodes and kiralyszarny kezdemenyezes.

name: Scotch Jatek
short_description: An open and direct central confrontation leading to early piece activity and simplified structures.

name: Philidor Vedelem
short_description: A szilard but somewhat passive defense aiming for a strong gyalog center and ellenjatek later.

name: Petrov Vedelem (Russian Jatek)
short_description: A szimmetrikus and highly szilard defense known for balanced and drawish tendencies at top level.

name: Evans Gambit
short_description: A sharp attacking gambit where White sacrifices a gyalog for rapid fejlodes and kezdemenyezes.

name: London Rendszer
short_description: A reliable and easy-to-learn setup focused on szilard structure and gradual kiralyszarny nyomas.

name: Slav Vedelem
short_description: A very szilard defense supporting the d5 gyalog while allowing active light-square futo fejlodes.

name: Semi-Slav Vedelem
short_description: A highly complex and theoretical system combining Slav solidity with Vezeri Gambit structures.

name: Benoni Vedelem
short_description: A dynamic and imbalanced defense where Black accepts a spatial disadvantage for active ellenjatek.

name: Benko Gambit
short_description: A long-term positional gambit where Black sacrifices a gyalog for vezeroldal nyomas and open files.

name: Catalan Megnyitas
short_description: A refined positional opening combining Queenâ€™s Gambit structure with kiralyszarny fianchetto nyomas.

name: Trompowsky Tamadas
short_description: An offbeat system where White immediately challenges the knight and aims for structural egyensulytalansagok.

name: Bird's Megnyitas
short_description: A flank opening aiming for kiralyszarny attacks, somewhat resembling a reversed Dutch Vedelem.

name: RĂ©ti Megnyitas: Symmetrical Valtozat
short_description: A hypermodern opening emphasizing rugalmas fejlodes and indirect central kontroll.

name: Sicilian Vedelem: Sveshnikov Valtozat
long_algebraic_notation: 1. e2-e4 c7-c5 2. Ng1-f3 Nb8-c6 3. d2-d4 c5xd4 4. Nf3xd4 Ng8-f6 5. Nb1-c3 e7-e5
short_description: A dynamic Sicilian line with central tension and structural egyensulytalansagok around d5 and the weak d5 square.

name: French Vedelem: Tarrasch Valtozat
short_description: A classical anti-Winawer approach emphasizing szilard fejlodes and rugalmas central play.

name: French Vedelem: Exchange Valtozat
short_description: A simplified French structure with szimmetrikus pawns but rich strategiai maneuvering.

name: Caro-Kann Vedelem: Panov Tamadas
short_description: A dynamic IQP-oriented setup where White prioritizes activity and central kezdemenyezes.

name: Vezeri Gambit Elutasitva: Exchange Valtozat
short_description: A strategiai structure with minority-attack themes and long-term gyalog-structure plans.

name: Italian Jatek: Two Knights Vedelem
long_algebraic_notation: 1. e2-e4 e7-e5 2. Ng1-f3 Nb8-c6 3. Bf1-c4 Ng8-f6
short_description: An active response to the Italian where Black develops quickly and invites taktikai possibilities.
